description: This table contains information about the staff member who requested a specific piece of equipment or instrument to be used during a surgery.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RQST_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the provider record for this row. This is the provider who requested a surgical device for a case.
